PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-02872003-03-18,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2000-603 of May 2, 2000, by replacing the words "for a term of five years" with the words "for a term ending May 17, 2006"; and designation of SHIRLEY R. WALES of Richmond Hill, Ontario, a full-time member of the Immigration Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office) to be an Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration Appeal Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office).
